product_summary: Thunderbit is a no-code AI app and automation builder that provides a suite of tools to help businesses automate tasks, improve productivity, and gain insights from data. Its features include a web assistant, AI-powered apps, automation capabilities, and data enrichment tools.
product_pros: Wide range of AI-powered apps and automations
Ability to customize and build your own AI tools
product_cons: Limited number of steps in the free tier
Some features are only available in paid plans
Can be complex to set up and configure for advanced use cases
May require some technical knowledge to get the most out of the platform

product_usecases.details: Thunderbit's web assistant can automatically summarize web content, making it easier to quickly understand the key points of a webpage.
Thunderbit allows you to create custom chatbots that can answer questions, provide support, and automate conversations.
Thunderbit's automation capabilities enable you to automate repetitive tasks, such as sending emails, creating documents, and updating databases.
Thunderbit provides tools for enriching data, such as extracting information from text, translating languages, and performing sentiment analysis.
Thunderbit allows you to build your own custom AI apps using its no-code interface, enabling you to solve specific business problems.

product_toolfor.details: Thunderbit is designed for business users who need to automate tasks, improve productivity, and gain insights from data without the need for coding skills.
Thunderbit can help entrepreneurs quickly build and deploy AI-powered solutions to solve business problems and gain a competitive edge.
Developers can use Thunderbit to extend the functionality of their applications by integrating AI and automation capabilities.
Thunderbit provides data analysis tools that can help data analysts extract insights from data, identify trends, and make better decisions.
Thunderbit's AI-powered chatbots can help customer support teams provide faster and more efficient support to customers.
